GeneDef.label: low fertility
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a lower chance of becoming pregnant or impregnating others.

GeneDef.label: lustful
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are more likely to engage in lovin' with their partner whatever of their genders.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Highly increase the chance of lovin'.

GeneDef.label: composed mind
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are strong willed and calm. They will never start social fights against they peers, they are less inclined to start negative interaction with them and their mental breakdowns are also always non violent.

customEffectDescriptions.li: less chance to triger a negative interaction with someone

GeneDef.label: emotionally brittle
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are much more susceptible to break under pressure and they will spend much more time in mental breakdowns than the average person.

GeneDef.label: reserved
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene keep their problems to themselves rather than discussing their issues to someone else.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Negative memories are more impactful and last much longer

GeneDef.label: loyal
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene exhibit more loyalty to their belief than the average person.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This pawn is much more persusasive when converting other and is harder to convert
Gain mood bonus or malus depending on the certainty level

GeneDef.label: natural psy-sensitivity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are more attuned to nature than other psy-sensitive persons.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Pawn will receive a -25% penalty to their psyfocus recovery when meditating near a non-natural spot

GeneDef.label: psychic manipulation
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can influence other persons with their own psychic sensitivity, the higher their sensitivity is, the higher the influence become

customEffectDescriptions.li: Each 25% psychic sensitivity beyond 100% will add a bonus point to this pawn social aptitude

GeneDef.label: animal connection
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have more ease communicating with wild and tamed animals

customEffectDescriptions.li: Reduce the chance for an animal to enter a manhunter state after a failed taming attempt if the carrier has more than 150% psychic sensitivity

GeneDef.label: slow aging
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene age slower after reaching 18 years old.

GeneDef.label: toxic vulnerability
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are vulnerable to toxic buildup and environmental toxins. Such as pollution, toxic fallout, tox gas, and direct attacks with venom or injected poison

GeneDef.label: genetic purity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene will is very likely to birth an offspring with the same gender and the offspring will only inherit the endogene of his mother.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This gene will follow one of the two behaviours if the mother is a foxian or is considered foxian enough

Behaviour 1: the mother is foxian. She will either birth a female child with the foxian xenotype, or in some rare cases, she will birth a special child with the greater foxian xenotype. That special child can either be a male or female (it is more likely to be a male). Only the cosmetic genes such as hair color or skin color will be transmited to the child

Behaviour 2: the mother is not a foxian. She will birth a normal child and transmit all of her endogenes to it if this gene was active as an endogene, otherwise, she will transmit all of her xenogenes.

GeneDef.label: immaculate
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene produce less filth than the average person.

GeneDef.label: female only
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are always biologically female.
